Title: 075: How to Re-Focus Your Career & Become an Entry Level Data Scientist
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Data Visualisation Consultant at The Information Lab, Rachel Phang. You will get to explore the data school at The Information Lab, you will know the importance of diverse backgrounds for Data Scientists, and you will be able to learn ways how to improve your data visualization skills.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/75
